description:
While Nobunaga was celebrating New Year’s in Gifu, a huge incident in Kyo shakes up the Oda Clan. An army attacks the imperial palace where Ashikaga Yoshiaki is. The ones leading the army are the Miyoshi Three and a mysterious man who seeks revenge against Nobunaga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La bataille en l’absence du démon
Oni no Inuma no Rokujou Kassen
The Rokujo Battle While the Demon Is Away
鬼の居ぬ間の六条合戦
